label: wicket_only
text:
caught at slip! And Zaheer hasn't conceded a run yet. Zaheer pitches the ball on a length around off, forcing Tharanga to prod because of his line as well as
the pressure he's created, the ball nips away from the left-hander off the pitch and Tharanga edges it. The chance flies quickly to Sehwag's right at first slip
and he takes it before falling to the ground Upul Tharanga c Sehwag b Khan 2 (20b 0x4 0x6 30m) SR: 10 KuMar Sangakkara, the captain, is next in . Sangakkara
scores the first run off Zaheer by dabbing towards mid-on and setting off at top speed. short ball and Dilshan swivels and pulls towards the fielder on the deep
square leg boundary. Sangakkara strides forward and drives a length ball from outside off to the fielder at cover, nicely timed. shot! Stopped! Sangakkara
lashed a full ball off the front foot, making superb contact with the cover drive, Raina was in the way at cover. short of a length and straight, Sangakkara
gets behind the line and defends.

label: boundary_four_only
text:
and there it is! A touch too short and Dilshan dismisses it with a pull off the front foot, hit in the air but over midwicket. Sreesanth beats Dilshan's attempt
at a booming drive on the up with a delivery that pitches short of a length outside off and bounces nicely, that was measured at 145.3 kph. and again! Dilshan
releases the pressure by cutting a short and wide ball from outside off to the backward point boundary. Loose ball, put away. tighter line and length closer to
off stump, Dilshan punches towards cover. Dilshan tries to drive through the line on the front foot but doesn't make good contact with a length delivery on off,
he plays that to mid-off. a touch slower and a lot straighter around middle and off, Dilshan tries to drive again but slices it towards point.

label: boundary_six_only
text:
Six over point! Wankhede goes mental! It was the shortish delivery outside off and Dhoni hopped, rode the bounce and played a superbly wicked cut over point.
The white ball kept flying. Almost run out! It was jabbed, off bat and pad, to point and the ball rolled to point. Yuvraj dashed across for the single, Dhoni
took couple of steps and then stopped. He then decided to rush across and boy did he rush or what? He makes it in time to beat the throw from point. leans
forward to turn to the leg side for a single. in the zone outside off and Dhoni jabs and stabs and the ball rushes past the edge. slower, on the middle, turned
to midwicket. Yuvraj is standing on the practice track close to the centre pitch! Not at the other end. Not damp there. short in length, extra bounce on that
one and Dhoni adjusts to shove it to cover.

label: wicket_and_boundary
text:
driven through cover as Sangakkara gets a bit of width outside off, and Tendulkar is sweeping on the boundary. super stroke! Sangakkara uses his feet, gets down
the pitch and clips Yuvraj between mid-on and midwicket and it's timed and placed to perfection. Classy. clipped away through the leg side for a single. soft
hands now as Jayawardene turns this one behind square. gone! Caught behind trying to cut! Yuvraj pushed this one across Sangakkara, whose eyes lit up as he went
hard at the shot and got an edge through to Dhoni, who made no mistake. What a massive blow that is, Sangakkara was starting to look really good. And golden-arm
Yuvraj does it again! Kumar Sangakkara c †Dhoni b Yuvraj Singh 48 (67b 5x4 0x6 102m) SR: 71.64 Here's Samaraweera. tossed up outside off and Samaraweera reaches
forward to defend.

label: four_and_six
text:
Zaheer bowls one full on the stump, and Thisara smokes it down to long off, absolutely smoked. Zaheer follows Mahela down the leg side with a yorker, but Mahela
is in such good touch that he manages to squeeze it late to short third man. serves up a low full around off stump, and thisara makes some room, and whacks it
past extra cover for another boundary, that is what you do in the batting Powerplay, take full toll of it. that is why Kula came in ahead of Thisara, who can
take off in these end overs, gets a full delivery, and launches it with a powerful swing, and the ball just beats a leaping mid on. super commitment from
Mahela, it was slogged wide of deep midwicket, Mahela pushed Thisara for the second, and backed up his intentions with a screaming dive to get in the crease. 63
runs off the batting Powerplay, 22 off 9 for Thisara, gets a fuller delivery in his swinging zone, swivels, and hammers it over deep square leg for maximum Sri
Lanka have surged to 274, thanks to an elegantly effective century from Mahela Jayawardene. This will take lots of chasing, they have a terrific bowling attack.
But the pitch has played true, these are the smallest boundaries at the Wankhede according to Ravi Shastri, and it can be done. This is also the big final,
there will be pressure, lots of it, there will be a legend to tackle in Muttiah Muralitharan, and the yorkers of Lasith Malinga to deal with. Can India do it?
They barely have twenty minutes to psyche themselves up. Join us for the final chase of this World Cup in some time. Nitin Sundar will take you through till the
first drinks break. That will be it from me, Abhishek Purohit. I will see you all on the Chatterbox.
